name: Socal Superbloom Lip and Cheek Dewy Gloss + Blush Tint
about: What it is: A clean, lip + cheek sheer dewy tint with hydrating hyaluronic acid glides on for a comfortable, buildable, natural glowy flush of color...Formulation Type: Lip Stain, Blush..Benefits: Hydrating, Long-wearing..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Hyaluronic Acid: Provides skin and lip hydration..- Niacinamide and Squalane: Condition to provide a silky finish..- Three-Step Stain Mixing Technology: Creates a transfer-proof hint of color...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: The versatile lip + cheek dewy formula provides a pop of color with a cushiony, silky-featherweight feel that's never dry or sticky. The oversized applicator makes it oh-so easy to use anywhere...Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: -Hyaluronic Acid: Provides skin and lip hydration..-Niacinamide and Squalane: Condition to provide a silky finish..-Three-Step Stain Mixing Technology: Creates a transfer-proof hint of color...Water (Aqua, Eau), Diphenyl Dimethicone, Diisostearyl Malate, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Octyldodecanol, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Bis-Behenyl/Isostearyl/Phytosteryl Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Diglycerin, Dipropylene Glycol, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Dimethicone, Sorbitan Isostearate, Polysorbate 60, Pentylene Glycol, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Ceteareth-20, Glycerin, Squalane, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Benzoate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Fragrance (Parfum), Benzyl Alcohol, Niacinamide, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Butylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Hyaluronate +/- May Contain/Peut Contenir: Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Yellow 6 (CI 15985), Red 28 (CI 45410), Blue 1 (CI 42090), Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Red 33 (CI 17200)......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.For Cheeks:.-Start with a few dots on cheeks and gently tap into skin using fingers, a brush, or a sponge..-Build the color from a sheer wash to more vibrant by tapping in additional product..-Pro Tip: The sheer stain has some playtime so no need to rush the application...For lips:.-Glide evenly on lips for all-over color..-Pro Tip: For popsicle lips, apply more in the center and tap out toward the edges...Recycling Instructions:.-Curbside recycle the FSC-certified paper carton..-Clean out the remaining formula from the bottle..-Discard the applicator and 50 percent post-consumer recycled cap..-Take the clean bottle and recycle at your local Sephora Pact Collective bin or mail to Pact Collective.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love the shade I chose and it works great on my face and lips for a pop of color. It’s not super pigmented but does last all day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! Everything about this is amazing. Beautiful colour (right after application, and the stain is leaves behind). Also really lovely on the cheeks. Leaves a subtle glow, and makes your skin look healthy and plump. Love it!
